ban-types: Avoid using the `Object` as a type. Use `object` instead
Avoid using the `Function` as a type. Use a specific function type, like `() => void`
Avoid using the `Boolean` as a type. Use `boolean` instead
Avoid using the `Number` as a type. Use `number` instead
Avoid using the `String` as a type. Use `string` instead
Avoid using the `Symbol` as a type. Use `symbol` instead
